attributes.action: Cease ALL immigration to the UK involving those who can bring nothing more than another way to waste more taxes by shelling out more money in 'Benefits' to individuals that have no interest in our laws, beliefs, culture or way of life.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is not a racially motivated petition, but one with the interests at heart of all British citizens that do not wish to see our country slip any further down the slopes of political correctness.
